page.title: 08LICHFIELD COLLEGE
page.content: Once called the School of Art and Evening Institute,it was founded in 1875,and later moved to its present site.There are morning,afternoon and evening classes.Anyone over the age of 16 can attend a class on payment of a fee.There are 153 subjects,about 3500 students and 120 teachers. There are vocational classes such as shorthand and typing.There are examination classes for those who wish to pass "O" & "A" level subjects.There are sewing,cooking,car maintenance classes,etc.for those who wish to improve their skills.Crafts such as woodworking,art,pottery & jewellery making are catered for.Physical well- being is provided for by classes in swimming,judo,keepfit,etc. The school organises trips to the theatre,etc.for its students. A creche is provided for infants.
